basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around
basic.color: Flower color brown, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or special humus soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, avoid strong direct light
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist all time, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely；remove peduncle after flowering
